entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Hello everyone ! This is Zane Zhou. Welcome to my personal website!

I’m an ordinary college student in China, and I’m studying at Tianjin Polytechnic University.
I am exceedingly excited that I can meet you right here.

Thank Github for giving me the oppotunity to build my own blog. I hope I can show my progress here.

Thank you!
